title: Vehicle Customization Request (Vinyl Wrap)
description: A customer wants to purchase a new car but wants a custom vinyl wrap applied before delivery.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the customer's request and explain that this is a post-sale, third-party modification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the correct expectation that this is not a factory option.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with a list of recommended local shops that specialize in vehicle wraps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of 2-3 trusted local vendors.

tasks.description: Offer to coordinate with the shop to have the wrap done after the vehicle purchase is complete but before the customer takes final delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent offers a value-added service to help facilitate the customization.
